headline: Seagate Technology Holdings (NasdaqGS:STX) Sees 18% Price Drop in Past Week Amid Global Trade Tariff Tensions
summary: Over the past week, Seagate Technology Holdings (NasdaqGS:STX) experienced a 18% decline in its share price, reflecting the broader market downturn triggered by escalating tensions surrounding global trade tariffs. The announcement of significant tariffs by President Donald Trump, coupled with China's reciprocal measures, has exacerbated concerns about future corporate profits and economic stability, sending the Nasdaq Composite into bear market territory. As a result, tech stocks, including...
